original_text: Timothy, guard what has been entrusted to your care. Turn away from godless chatter and the opposing ideas of what is falsely called knowledge,
korean_text: 디모데야 망령되고 헛된 말과 거짓된 지식의 반론을 피함으로 네게 부탁한 것을 지키라

sentences.original_text: Timothy, guard what has been entrusted to your care.
and opposing ideas of what is falsely called knowledge,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 거짓으로 지식이라 부르는 것의 반대되는 생각들에서 물러나라.
